tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT This) (CD 5) (NN day) (NN break/vacation)) (VP (VBZ is) (ADVP (JJ much)) (VP (VBN needed))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [needed/VBN nsubjpass>[break/vacation/NN det>This/DT nummod>5/CD compound>day/NN] auxpass>is/VBZ advmod>much/JJ punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VB Celebrate) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ little) (NNS things)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NN life))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Celebrate/VB dobj>[things/NNS det>the/DT amod>little/JJ nmod:in>[life/NN case>in/IN]] punct>./.]
